headline.main: Accam Helps Fire Earn 1-1 Draw With Crew in Opener
headline.print_headline: Accam Helps Fire Earn 1-1 Draw With Crew in Opener

lead_paragraph: David Accam turned a defender around before scoring late in the second half to lift the Chicago Fire to a 1-1 draw with the Columbus Crew is a Major League Soccer opener on Saturday.
snippet: David Accam turned a defender around before scoring late in the second half to lift the Chicago Fire to a 1-1 draw with the Columbus Crew is a Major League Soccer opener on Saturday....
